name: Unbridled Horror Demo
description:
-Synopsis:
This story tells us about the teenage-girl, who once has awaken in a strange place.
She doesn't remember, what's happened to her and she doesn't know, where she is.
Will you help her to remember everything? Overcome the fears? Find the way
home? Or you will live her alone in such ominous place forever? Made with unreal engine 4  

W/A/S/D walk E/RMB interact F flashlight I inventory O diary R grab V close eyes

you can look this game on my other account on itch.io
